methods.name: getHeight
javadoc: Returns the height of the icon, in pixels.

methods.name: getU
javadoc: Gets a U coordinate on the icon. 0 returns uMin and 16 returns uMax. Other arguments return in-between values.

methods.name: getU0
javadoc: Returns the minimum U coordinate to use when rendering with this icon.

methods.name: getU1
javadoc: Returns the maximum U coordinate to use when rendering with this icon.

methods.name: getV
javadoc: Gets a V coordinate on the icon. 0 returns vMin and 16 returns vMax. Other arguments return in-between values.

methods.name: getV0
javadoc: Returns the minimum V coordinate to use when rendering with this icon.

methods.name: getV1
javadoc: Returns the maximum V coordinate to use when rendering with this icon.

methods.name: getWidth
javadoc: Returns the width of the icon, in pixels.
